channel.title: Another way of making a desktop background (more detailed)
channel.description:
OK, well ~tiger~ did a horrible job so i will simplify it. And the buttons highlighted in yellow are the buttons u click
1. First change ur homepage to the website you want on your desktop.
2.Go to your desktop , right click, and select properties. [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img370.imageshack.us/img370/1523/tut1we5.png[/img][/URL]
3.Then click desktop. There, click on customize desktop. [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img370.imageshack.us/img370/7907/tut2bd4.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img164.imageshack.us/img164/8021/tut3xb6.png[/img][/URL]
4.Another popup will come up, then click web (the second tab.) [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img185.imageshack.us/img185/161/tut4la0.png[/img][/URL]
5.You will see a box checked or unchecked saying My current homepage check it and there you have it. [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img164.imageshack.us/img164/187/tut5bp3.png[/img][/URL]
comments? problems? post here

item.title: Another way of making a desktop background (more detailed)
item.dc:creator: @whothe0 the fu superior
item.description:
@whothe0 wrote:

OK, well ~tiger~ did a horrible job so i will simplify it. And the buttons highlighted in yellow are the buttons u click

  1. First change ur homepage to the website you want on your desktop.

2.Go to your desktop , right click, and select properties.

3.Then click desktop. There, click on customize desktop.

4.Another popup will come up, then click web (the second tab.)

5.You will see a box checked or unchecked saying My current homepage check it and there you have it.

comments? problems? post here
